calendar.description: Senate Government Operations and Political Subdivisions Hearing

general_provisions: This bill addresses firearm safety instruction in public schools.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>requires a local education agency to provide firearm safety instruction to students; <hr><ltbullet>provides guidelines on how a local education agency may provide the firearm safety instruction;<hr><ltbullet>requires that individuals providing instruction with an actual firearm have certain authority to possess a firearm; and<hr><ltbullet>includes an opt-out provision.
